entry.title: Monday night: Flurries. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Local amount 5 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening then light overnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 6:54 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A few flurries. High minus 7.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the morning then mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill near minus 14. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:54 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries late in the evening and overnight. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 6:54 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023
